title: Chapter 298: Yaorao
body:
Chapter 298: Yaorao

Chapter 298: Yaorao


Under the excellent disguise of Ren Tianyou, coupled with not a single Demon clan thinking a human could break through the space barrier between the two worlds and enter Demon World, now Ren Tianyou who had changed his name into Uchiha Tianyou openly entered Bloody Cloud City.


After entering Bloody Cloud City, he saw tall and big buildings just like a forest inside the city, and people were walking to and from on the street. It wasn’t different compared to human society.


In the Demon World, the currency of trading were magic coins, and also a kind of rare magic stones.


So now the primary task of Ren Tianyou was to earn some money. As the saying goes, without money, one is unable to move a single step, if he wanted to smoothly keep going in this Demon World, then money was absolute necessity.


Currently inside the space ring of Ren Tianyou, there were many magic cores, magic crystals and also a number of divinity crystal. Generally these things could be exchanged into money.


When Ren Tianyou came out from the goods exchange shop, his right hand held a bag of money. And after nodding his head in satisfaction, he placed it inside his space ring.


Now that he had money, the next thing was gathering a number of information, and the biggest place to obtain all kinds of information was a pub.


Every day that place receives hundreds and thousands of all kinds of pedestrians, including mercenaries, assassins, and so on. Generally when they rest here, all of them would talk about the things they had seen or heard.


In the centermost location of Bloody Cloud City, there was the biggest pub of the city—-Blood Mist Pub!


After pushing open the door, and entering inside the pub, bustling noises entered into the ears of Ren Tianyou, immediately making his brows to cease tightly.


Compared to this kind of noisy environment, Ren Tianyou preferred a quiet place.


Inside the pub, there was a wide hall, and this wide hall was dimly lit with several dangling dim magic lamps.


In the hall, around the disorderly laid liquor tables, small and big people of Demon clan were sitting while drinking wine, chatting with each other and making an uproar.


Looking at this noisy hall, Ren Tianyou took a deep breath to calm down, and his tightly ceased brows also slowly loosen.


Entering the hall, Ren Tianyou arrived at the bar of the pub. In the bar, he saw a flirtatious beauty of Demon clan wearing a piece of cloth which only covered her three important place. Her those slender waist would give people a kind of primitive impulse.


“Give me a bottle of your best wine here.” Looking at this bewitchingly charming woman in the bar, Ren Tianyou slowly narrowed his eyes, then putting his right hand on the bar table, he said to this woman.


“Ah, where did you come from little handsome guy, you are so handsome ah.” Seeing Ren Tianyou’s that handsome face, this beautiful woman bewitchingly shot a glance at Ren Tianyou, and covering her mouth with her right hand, she chuckled.


“He he, big sister must be joking.” Hearing the flirt of this beautiful woman, Ren Tianyou looked at her eyes without batting an eyelid, and said, “Don’t know what good wine is found here? I, your little brother however haven’t drunk any wine for these past several days, so this face has already faded out.”


“Hee hee, this is your first time coming to our Blood Mist Pub, isn’t that so?” Hearing Ren Tianyou, this beautiful woman suddenly looked straight towards Ren Tianyou and said.


“Oh, how can you be so sure?” The facial expression of Ren Tianyou didn’t change, but his eyes flashed with blood color, then Sharingan began to spin rapidly.


Honestly speaking, this woman in front of him was very beautiful. Compared to all the beautiful girls he had seen before, she was matchlessly beautiful. Looking at her body, even Ren Tianyou couldn’t help but feel indescribable impulse, and his mouth also became a little dry.


He didn’t know why, but from the first time he had seen this woman, a kind of interest which he himself didn’t understand appeared inside his heart. He was unable to describe this feeling in words, moreover when he observed this woman with his Sharingan, he discovered nothing. She was just an ordinary again not ordinary woman of Demon clan. The energy fluctuation within her body was roughly comparable to the strength of Saint ranked human.


But Ren Tianyou however believed his feeling, although he didn’t understand what his feeling signifies, but he decided to pay a little bit closer attention to this woman.


“Hee hee, I don’t have any other innate talent, but my ability of recognizing people and remembering them however is not weak. As long as any people came to my bar even once, from the second time on, I will definitely recognize them.” Saying this, this beautiful woman extended her jade hand towards the right hand of Ren Tianyou which he had placed on the top of a bar. After that slowly drawing a circle on the back of his hand with her jade finger, she charmingly chuckled, “Not to mention little brother is such a handsome guy, so how can I forget you.”


“Ha ha, this beautiful big sister is flattering me.” Feeling the jade finger streaking across on the back of his hand, Ren Tianyou smiled. After that holding her hand, he lowered his head and lightly kissed on the back of her hand, and said, “I request this big sister to take out a good wine, I, your little brother can’t wait any longer.”


“Yo, is our big sister Yaorao finding new target again?” At this moment, a coarse and wild voice resounded from the side. A sturdy man of Demon clan wearing a heavy armor was walking over, and seeing that very handsome face compared to majority of the Demon clan’s people of Ren Tianyou, he had spoken a little bit hatefully.


“Labake, if you don’t want to die, then control you big mouth.” Seeing this robust man i.e, Labake walking over, this beautiful woman glared with disdain flashing in her beautiful eyes, and said coldly.


“You…” Hearing this beautiful woman, Labake suddenly get flustered. He wanted to get angry, but thinking of his father’s words as well as the rumor he had heard about this woman, fear appeared in his eyes. After that without any words, he retreated. But while lowering his head, his eyes were flashing with ruthless glint.


“Didn’t expect you were so powerful. Just the words of yours made him retreat.” Ren Tianyou took a bottle of wine located on the bar, and while unceasingly rotating that as if human blood wine inside that bottle, he opened his mouth.


That Labake of just now, his strength was equivalent to the strength of peak-Deity ranked human, but he however retreated with only the words from this woman, this made Ren Tianyou increase his guard against this beautiful woman.


“Hee hee, I however made you laugh, in this chaotic place, if I didn’t have a little means, then how can I live until now?” Hearing Ren Tianyou, this beautiful woman covered her mouth and softly laughed. Then looking at Ren Tianyou, she said, “I am Yaorao, don’t know what your name is?” [T.L: Yaorao means enchanting, alluring, fascinating]


“Enchanting!” Hearing the name of this woman, Ren Tianyou sized up this woman. Feeling that mature charming aura emitting from her body, Ren Tianyou smiled and said, “This name is very suitable for you.”


“As for my name, you should firmly remember it, because afterwards my name is going to spread all over the entire Demon World.” Finished speaking, Ren Tianyou turned around, held the wine with his hand and walked towards the hall’s drinking table, “My name is Uchiha Tianyou!”


“Uchiha Tianyou, what a strange name!” Hearing Ren Tianyou, and looking at his back view, Yaorao softly said, “Interesting youngster……”
